00047 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 #define CURSOR_STEP                         (1)
00049 #define JOYKEY_NONE                         (0x0)
00050 #define JOYKEY_LEFT                         (0x1)
00051 #define JOYKEY_RIGHT                        (0x2)
00052 #define JOYKEY_UP                           (0x3)
00053 #define JOYKEY_DOWN                         (0x4)
00054 #define JOYKEY_SEL                          (0x5)
00055 #define JOYKEY_KEY1                         (0x6)
00056 #define JOYKEY_KEY2                         (0x7)
00057 
00058 #define CLASS_DESC_OFFSET                   (18)
00059 
00060 #define CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT               (u16)(0x1 << 8)
00061 #define CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE               (u16)(0x2 << 8)
00062 #define CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO               (u16)(0x3 << 8)
00063 #define CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT               (u16)(0x9 << 8)
00064 #define CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE               (u16)(0xA << 8)
00065 #define CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO               (u16)(0xB << 8)
00066 
00067 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT              (0x01)
00068 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_02_OUTPUT             (0x02)
00069 #define HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE            (0x03)
00070 
00071 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00072 typedef __PACKED_H struct _MOUSE_BIT
00073 {
00074   u8 B1 :1;
00075   u8 B2 :1;
00076   u8 B3 :1;
00077 } __PACKED_F MouseButton_bit;
00078 
00079 typedef __PACKED_H union _MOUSEBUTTON_TYPEDEF
00080 {
00081   u8 Byte;
00082   MouseButton_bit bits;
00083 } __PACKED_F MouseButton_TypeDef;
00084 
00085 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00086 {
00087   MouseButton_TypeDef Button;
00088   s8 x;
00089   s8 y;
00090   s8 _reserved;
00091 } __PACKED_F Mouse_TypeDef;
00092 
00093 /* Following define skip the address-of-packed-member warning of GUN compiler                               */
00094 #if defined (__GNUC__)
00095 #if (__GNUC__ >= 9)
00096   #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Waddress-of-packed-member"
00097 #endif
00098 #endif

00102 /* USB HID Report Descriptor                                                                                */
00103 __ALIGN4 static uc8 USB_HID_ReportDesc[] = {
00104     0x05, 0x01,                    // USAGE_PAGE (Generic Desktop)
00105     0x09, 0x02,                    // USAGE (Mouse)
00106     0xa1, 0x01,                    // COLLECTION (Application)
00107     0x09, 0x01,                    //   USAGE (Pointer)
00108 
00109     0xa1, 0x00,                    //   COLLECTION (Physical)
00110     0x05, 0x09,                    //     USAGE_PAGE (Button)
00111     0x19, 0x01,                    //     USAGE_MINIMUM (Button 1)
00112     0x29, 0x03,                    //     USAGE_MAXIMUM (Button 3)
00113 
00114     0x15, 0x00,                    //     LOGICAL_MINIMUM (0)
00115     0x25, 0x01,                    //     LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (1)
00116     0x75, 0x01,                    //     REPORT_SIZE (1)
00117     0x95, 0x03,                    //     REPORT_COUNT (3)
00118     0x81, 0x02,                    //     INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00119 
00120     0x95, 0x01,                    //     REPORT_COUNT (1)
00121     0x75, 0x05,                    //     REPORT_SIZE (5)
00122     0x81, 0x01,                    //     INPUT (Cnst, Var, Abs)
00123 
00124     0x05, 0x01,                    //     USAGE_PAGE (Generic Desktop)
00125     0x09, 0x30,                    //     USAGE (X)
00126     0x09, 0x31,                    //     USAGE (Y)
00127     0x15, 0x81,                    //     LOGICAL_MINIMUM (-127)
00128     0x25, 0x7f,                    //     LOGICAL_MAXIMUM (127)
00129     0x75, 0x08,                    //     REPORT_SIZE (8)
00130     0x95, 0x02,                    //     REPORT_COUNT (2)
00131     0x81, 0x06,                    //     INPUT (Data, Var, Abs)
00132     0xc0,                          //   END_COLLECTION
00133     0xc0                           // END_COLLECTION
00134 };
00135

00138 __ALIGN4 static u8 gFeatureReportBuffer[64];
00139 
00140 static vu32 gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00141 __ALIGN4 static Mouse_TypeDef gMouseInfo;

00167 /* Global Function -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169   * @brief  USB Class initialization.
00170   * @param  pClass: pointer of USBDCore_Class_TypeDef
00171   * @retval None
00172   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00173 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass)
00174 {
00175   pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.func = USBDClass_MainRoutine;
00176   //pClass->CallBack_MainRoutine.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00177 
00178   pClass->CallBack_Reset.func = USBDClass_Reset;
00179   //pClass->CallBack_Reset.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00180 
00181   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.func = USBDClass_StartOfFrame;
00182   //pClass->CallBack_StartOfFrame.uPara = (u32)NULL;
00183 
00184   pClass->CallBack_ClassGetDescriptor = USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor;
00185   //pClass->CallBack_ClassSetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_SetInterface;
00186   //pClass->CallBack_ClassGetInterface = USBDClass_Standard_GetInterface;
00187 
00188   pClass->CallBack_ClassRequest = USBDClass_Request;
00189   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[1] = USBDClass_Endpoint1;
00190   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[2] = USBDClass_Endpoint2;
00191   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[3] = USBDClass_Endpoint3;
00192   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[4] = USBDClass_Endpoint4;
00193   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[5] = USBDClass_Endpoint5;
00194   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[6] = USBDClass_Endpoint6;
00195   //pClass->CallBack_EPTn[7] = USBDClass_Endpoint7;
00196 
00197   #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00198   pClass->CallBack_EPTn[RETARGET_RX_EPT] = SERIAL_USBDClass_RXHandler;
00199   #endif
00200 
00201   gMouseInfo.x = 0;
00202   gMouseInfo.y = 0;
00203   gMouseInfo.Button.Byte = 0x0;
00204 
00205   return;
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00209 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00210   * @brief  USB Class main routine.
00211   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class main routine
00212   * @retval None
00213   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00214 static void USBDClass_MainRoutine(u32 uPara)
00215 {
00216   USBDClass_EPT1INProcess();
00217 
00218   return;
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00222   * @brief  USB Class Endpoint 1 IN Process for application.
00223   * @retval None
00224   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00225 static void USBDClass_EPT1INProcess(void)
00226 {
00227   gMouseInfo.x = 0;
00228   gMouseInfo.y = 0;
00229   if (gIsEP1INEmpty == TRUE)
00230   {
00231     gMouseInfo.Button.bits.B1 = !HT32F_DVB_PBGetState(BUTTON_KEY1);
00232     gMouseInfo.Button.bits.B2 = !HT32F_DVB_PBGetState(BUTTON_KEY2);
00233 
00234     if (HT32F_DVB_PBGetState(BUTTON_WAKEUP))
00235       gMouseInfo.x += CURSOR_STEP;
00236 
00237     gIsEP1INEmpty = FALSE;
00238     USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(USBD_EPT1, (u32 *)&gMouseInfo, 3);
00239   }
00240 
00241   return;
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00245   * @brief  USB Class Reset.
00246   * @param  uPara: Parameter for Class Reset.
00247   * @retval None
00248   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00249 static void USBDClass_Reset(u32 uPara)
00250 {
00251   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00252 }

00268 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00269   * @brief  USB Device Class Request
00270   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00271   * @retval None
00272   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00273 static void USBDClass_Request(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00274 {
00275   u16 uUSBCmd = *((u16 *)(&(pDev->Request)));
00276 
00277 #ifdef RETARGET_IS_USB
00278   SERIAL_USBDClass_Request(pDev);
00279 #endif
00280 
00281   switch (uUSBCmd)
00282   {
00283     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00284     /* | bRequest             | Data transfer direction | Type                | Recipient   | Data          */
00285     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00286 
00287     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00288     /* | 01_Get Report        | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 01A1h         */
00289     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00290     case (CLASS_REQ_01_GET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00291     {
00292       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength );
00293       USBDClass_GetReport(pDev);
00294       break;
00295     }
00296     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00297     /* | 02_Get Idle          | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 02A1h         */
00298     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00299     case (CLASS_REQ_02_GET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00300     {
00301       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00302       USBDClass_GetIdle(pDev);
00303       break;
00304     }
00305     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00306     /* | 03_Get Protocol      | 80_Device-to-Host       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 03A1h         */
00307     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308     case (CLASS_REQ_03_GET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_01_D2H | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00309     {
00310       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld GET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00311       USBDClass_GetProtocol(pDev);
00312       break;
00313     }
00314     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00315     /* | 09_Set Report        | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0921h         */
00316     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00317     case (CLASS_REQ_09_SET_RPOT | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00318     {
00319       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET RPOT\t[%02d][%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, pDev->Request.wValueH, pDev->Request.wLength);
00320       USBDClass_SetReport(pDev);
00321       break;
00322     }
00323     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00324     /* | 0A_Set Idle          | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0A21h         */
00325     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00326     case (CLASS_REQ_0A_SET_IDLE | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00327     {
00328       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET IDLE\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00329       USBDClass_SetIdle(pDev);
00330       break;
00331     }
00332     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00333     /* | 0B_Set Protocol      | 00_Host-to-Device       | 20_Class Request    | 1_Interface | 0B21h         */
00334     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335     case (CLASS_REQ_0B_SET_PTCO | REQ_DIR_00_H2D | REQ_TYPE_01_CLS | REQ_REC_01_INF):
00336     {
00337       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld SET PTCO\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00338       USBDClass_SetProtocol(pDev);
00339       break;
00340     }
00341   }
00342 
00343   return;
00344 }
00345 
00346 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00347   * @brief  USB Device Class Standard Request - GET_DESCRIPTOR
00348   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00349   * @retval None
00350   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00351 static void USBDClass_Standard_GetDescriptor(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00352 {
00353   u32 type = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00354 
00355   switch (type)
00356   {
00357     case DESC_TYPE_21_HID:
00358     {
00359       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)((pDev->Desc.pConfnDesc) + CLASS_DESC_OFFSET);
00360       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_HID;
00361       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00362       break;
00363     }
00364     case DESC_TYPE_22_RPOT:
00365     {
00366       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)(USB_HID_ReportDesc);
00367       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = DESC_LEN_RPOT;
00368       pDev->Transfer.Action = USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00369       break;
00370     }
00371     case DESC_TYPE_23_PHY:
00372     {
00373       break;
00374     }
00375   } /* switch (type)                                                                                        */
00376 
00377   return;
00378 }

00406 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00407   * @brief  USB Device Class Request - GET_REPORT
00408   * @param  pDev: pointer of USB Device
00409   * @retval None
00410   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00411 static void USBDClass_GetReport(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00412 {
00413   u32 value = pDev->Request.wValueH;
00414   u32 len = pDev->Request.wLength;
00415 
00416   switch (value)
00417   {
00418     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_01_INPUT:
00419     {
00420       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gInputReportBuffer);
00421       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00422       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00423       break;
00424     }
00425     case HID_RPOT_TYPE_03_FEATURE:
00426     {
00427       pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(gFeatureReportBuffer);
00428       pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = len;
00429       pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00430       break;
00431     }
00432   }
00433 
00434   return;
00435 }
00436

00440   * @retval None
00441   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00442 static void USBDClass_GetIdle(USBDCore_Device_TypeDef *pDev)
00443 {
00444   /* Add your own GET_IDLE function here....
00445      For example....
00446 
00447   u32 uReportID  = pDev->Request.wValueL;
00448   u32 uInterface = pDev->Request.wIndex;
00449 
00450   pDev->Transfer.pData = (uc8 *)&(__IDLE_DURATION_BUFFER[uReportID]);
00451   pDev->Transfer.sByteLength = 1;
00452   pDev->Transfer.Action= USB_ACTION_DATAIN;
00453 
00454   */
00455   return;
00456 }

00527 /*********************************************************************************************************//**

00529   * @param  EPTn: USB Endpoint number
00530   *         @arg USBD_EPT0 ~ USBD_EPT7
00531   * @retval None
00532   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00533 static void USBDClass_Endpoint1(USBD_EPTn_Enum EPTn)
00534 {
00535   gIsEP1INEmpty = TRUE;
00536 
00537   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld EP1IN\t[%02d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, (int)USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00538   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)gInputReportBuffer, USBDCore_EPTGetBufferLen(EPTn));
00539 
00540   return;
00541 }
